A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I saw it on opening night on Wed (France) and I loved it. Aesthetically it was very pretty and cool. Crait especially is very interesting visually. Psychologically the themes were super interesting\, the characters were moving. Everyone learned things\, and I went from tense to awed to sad to happy every five minutes. It was a really good movie. It went places. It will definitely not be a movie you can be neutral about - either you hate it\, or you love it.
